div.div: Chihiro Wamura is an unassuming otaku girl who happens to sit next to Kaname Rutou, the beautiful honor student. They don't have anything in common, until one day Rutou-san asked Wamura to take a selfie with her while in class?
Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Sports

Hiyori Hinamori is practicing her golf game at a driving range. Next to her, she meets Eirin Kotori, who hits an outrageous shot with one hand...? Hinamori, who has never known the sky, creates a whirlwind in the world of high school girls' golf with Kotori.
